document.full_text: denis lebedev knocked out roy jones jr. in the final round of their non-title cruiserweight fight in moscow on saturday, handing the american his third consecutive defeat.
document.title: denis lebedev knocks out roy jones jr. in moscow
lines_and_colors: denis lebedev knocked out roy jones jr. in the final round of their non-title cruiserweight fight in moscow on saturday, handing the american his third consecutive defeat.
